website_summaries.verdict: Dead or Alive 5: Last Round gives Steam users a new and complex fighting game to add to their libraries, but the abysmal online play limits the fun and lasting appeal.
pros: Combo-oriented fighting is easy to grasp, but offers plenty of depth
Great character models and fluid animations

customer_reviews.title: I am in love❤❤❤
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a gamer girl, DOA is one of my favorite fighting games, last night after it arrived I played for 6 1/2 hours. Even though it was a used game it is in perfect condition and the book is still with it. The only complaint I have is about the actual book and it's not Amazon's/ sellers fault that's on the company, I was expecting a more in-depth analysis of the characters but I'll just look them up and make my own.
customer_reviews.author: BlackCandle

customer_reviews.title: My Personal Favorite Fighter
customer_reviews.text: This is my personal favorite fighting game. The rock-paper-scissors gameplay mechanic is easy enough for newcomers, but each character also has enough depth for experienced players. Each attack feels like it carries real weight, a minor detail that seems so important when you think of how many fighting games get this wrong. If you can keep yourself away from the overpriced DLC, this game is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: EDT94

customer_reviews.title: Perfect game for versus combat.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this game for my wife and I to play. She wanted a game that we could play versus each other, that wasn't to difficult to learn. This is perfect. We've had quite a few nights where we'll pop a bottle wine and play for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am a simple man
customer_reviews.text: I am a simple man, I saw boobs and I bought it
customer_reviews.author: Sephiroth348

customer_reviews.title: DOA at its Best
customer_reviews.text: I'm a long time DOA fan since DOA 2 on the PS2, but I've always found it weird how only that game had English voice acting. Enter DOA 5, which improves everything over all of the other games. With an improved combat via the power blow feature, full English voice acting, and surprisingly good (for a fighting game) story mode, this is the best DOA title I've played in years.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie K. Coates, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Solid game. Lots of sexy cheescake and costumes. Most are sadly DLC costumes.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best in the series. Bogged down by DLC but its only costume DLC and the characters will function and play the same regardless. Lots of fun sexy cheesecake and over the top characters. And still a good fighter. If you enjoy sexy girls and maybe buff dudes. this is a great pick up even with a lot of the best outfits behind a DLC paywall.
customer_reviews.author: Brad80

customer_reviews.title: missing characters
customer_reviews.text: it said it comes with avery dlc and it has 3 charcters locked and only 2 of them are available for purchase the other one is not on the ps network i love this gamebut it said the last round version comes with all the dlcs , also i have to search for some of them and download them it does not seems like this has everything its promise
customer_reviews.author: Sergio

customer_reviews.title: Sexy girls and guys, fluid and easy to use fighting moves, lots of jiggling everywhere, a man's game.
customer_reviews.text: If you like women, curvy women with large breasts, large jiggly breasts...then this is the game for you. Not only that, it has a few characters from Virtua Fighter in it. The best thing is that this isnt just an eye-candy game, the fighting aspect of the game is actually extremely well done and flexible, the direction you push changes your attacks, so you have many moves to choose from. Also, this being the PS4 version, it has much more realistic skin, something the PC and last gen versions do not have.
customer_reviews.author: Apie

customer_reviews.title: I love the Dead or Alive franchise!
customer_reviews.text: The game is perfect! It’s better than the ps3 version because this game has access to new stages and new dlc characters on the PS4. The graphics are better as well. The price is lower than what it was at launch which adds to the value of this purchase. Also, I would buy from this seller again. The product was as listed and it was delivered within 3 days.

customer_reviews.title: The core game is a fun arcade fighter that manages to be playfully sexy without ...
customer_reviews.text: The core game is a fun arcade fighter that manages to be playfully sexy without being raunchy. My only complaint is the hundreds of dollars in DLC. These sorts of things that used to be bonuses for clearing challenges are now paid addons, and the core game is lacking in unique outfits. The devs should take a look at the likes of Senran Kagura to balance DLC against unlockables.

customer_reviews.author: Rod Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Still awesome
customer_reviews.text: After I bought this, I learned that I could have gotten a free digital copy since I had Ultimate. But I didn't really care that much. DOA LR is a great fighting game, with emphasis on presentation. Everything looks great at native 1080 at 60fps. Gameplay centers around learning combos and retaliating against attacks. Even though this is the third version of DOA5 I've bought, it still remains one of my favorite fighting games, along side with Tekken 5. Must have for hard core gamers.
customer_reviews.author: Navitattle7

customer_reviews.title: DOA 5 is dead on great!
customer_reviews.text: I've been a fan of this series for a long, long time and the latest installment does not disappoint. I was blown away by the graphics and attention to detail the developers paid to the characters, customers, and fighting arenas. There are the classic game modes, but what I really enjoy is the arcade mode, and every time you best it, you unlock a new arena or costume or character which really adds to how repayable the game is.
customer_reviews.author: scott kuerbitz

customer_reviews.title: DOA...Still hardcore!!
customer_reviews.text: This game is for the hardcore DOA fans that enjoy the fight! Great slight upgrade over the PS3 version now on PS4 so glad they did port it over. Clean graphics never disappoint, though they don't begin to use the PS4's real power maybe the will in part 6. Until then I will enjoy this gem and all its extras. Speaking of which the extra downloads if you choose can get pricey over all but that is my only complaint.

customer_reviews.title: The game is as awesome as I expected
customer_reviews.text: The game is as awesome as I expected, I had a demo version of it with a few characters, but I wanted the full thing. I honestly haven't had much problems with the online mode, and the story mode is actually kinda long. I like being able to smash my opponent through walls and stone pillars and stuff. And you can also knock them off edges and down to a lower level of the stage, there are no ringouts. I haven't noticed any problems so far that is really major or anything. All in all I enjoy the game and am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Same fun as DoA5U!
customer_reviews.text: Coming from DoA5U, DoA5LR is nearly the same game just tweeks and updates they made to the game, stages and being able to run at 1080p 60fps. Plus the additon of the new 5 dlc characters included. If you want a new figting game for your next gen console this a must have. PS. Many people are having trouble with the pre order bonus, if you preordered it amazon sends you a code by email so don't expect to receive a code inside the box.

customer_reviews.title: 2 Ultimate is still by far my personal favorite for the vast and beautifully crafted stages paired with ...

So I can get the game, get the exclusive DLC and play it once it comes out right? The game itself is great though.

customer_reviews.title: No major improvements over DOA5+

The graphics are so-so for a next gen console, yes better than on the Vita but nothing mind-boggling. I beat the game in 3 hours and felt that the story was superficial. Beware of DLC rip-offs, this game will cost you $400 if you purchase all costume and fighter packs!

customer_reviews.title: A shadow of its former self
customer_reviews.text: $92.99 season pass for outfits and the online has not improved over PS3 and Xbox 360 versions. The fans pour so much money into this game and Koei Tecmo corp refuses to address the netcode. The reps for the company tell us "the game is free to play" and "good netcode is hard" Well why do you keep releasing this game with no real substantial improvements that make the game more fun to play? It's really crazy to me that they are getting away with this and no one really is saying anything.

product_meta.title: DEAD OR ALIVE 5 Last Round - PlayStation 4
product_meta.description: Platform:PlayStation 4DEAD OR ALIVE 5 Last Round will take to the ring to deliver the signature DOA fighting style, wrapped up in the most graphically impressive version of a DEAD OR ALIVE game ever seen. The combatants in DEAD OR ALIVE 5 Last Round will present an unparalleled level of life-like detail, and smooth striking animations that will firmly place every fighter in the heat of the moment. The game's dynamic interactive stages once again boast a range of visually striking locations from around the world, while offering even more destruction, deadly new danger zones and a higher level of strategic choices for players to utilize in the quest for victory. DEAD OR ALIVE 5 Last Round will deliver the largest roster of fighters in any DOA game to date. Fighters will include: Hayabusa, Hayate, Kasumi, Ayane, Rig, Momiji, Leon, Kokoro, Tina, Lisa, Brad Wong, Jann Lee, Hitomi, Leifang, Christie, Eliot, Leon, Gen Fu, Bayman, Bass, Zack, Helena, Marie Rose, Phase 4 and newly released Nyotengu along with Akira, Pai, Jacky and Sarah Bryant from the Virtua Fighter series. Character customization options get even deeper, as DEAD OR ALIVE 5 Last Round will offer over 300 open and unlockable costumes, and the brand new hairstyle and accessory options will give nearly endless possibilities to adorn the fighters for any occasion. Players can bring their run of rosters, costumes and accessories from DEAD OR ALIVE 5 Ultimate, as previously purchased DLC content will be transferable from last gen consoles to the PS4 and Xbox One.
